column4: i just installed 7.10, and everything is working great! (much to my surprise) .  what is ubuntu using for its visual effects, compriz or beryl?
compiz and beryl have merged into the compiz-fusion project, which is what Gutsy uses.
very nice, works perfect!  i don't need to work on anything except maybe getting nfs going.
The text installer or the live-cd installer?
